title: I am Gurdjieff, I will not die_Eng-subt.
description:
Russian documentary, with english subtitles,  about George Ivanovich Gurdjieff, a great traveler and adventurer, a magician and astrologer, a great prophet and healer, a teacher and a teacher of dancing". The year of his birthwas 1866.. No, that's not right, his sister said 1872.. No, in the papers it's written 1877.. Date... Already there begins a mystery, because nobody knows the exact date.....
 "What is life? Why is there suffering? Does man have a soul? Is the soul immortal? "-questions in his search..
 "He gave through Hauskofer, to future Nazis the symbol, that would lead them to collapse."
Interesting moments from his life and search for Truth which he found..His body died, but not he.
October 1949, the disciples came to the hospital to say goodbye. They expected directions. Gurdjieff looked at them long with a mild, slightly sad smile, and then said: Well, you are in chaos.
...............
The Secret Services of leading States began their bloody chase after the last writings of George Ivanovich How did it finish? Was it finished? 
.........
Thanks to Beba Mur for translation from Russian to Serbo-Croatian.
This is translation from Serbo-Croation to English.
Thanks to John for editing English translation
